pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:5.1: 22. The training rule on bathing robes
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:6.2: At that time the Master had allowed bathing robes for the nuns.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:6.4: Knowing this, the nuns from the group of six wore over-sized bathing robes.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:6.5: As they were walking about, they were dragging them along, both from the front and from behind.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:7.1: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:7.3: “How can the nuns from the group of six use over-sized bathing robes?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:7.4: “Is it true, monks, that the nuns from the group of six do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:7.7: How can the nuns from the group of six use over-sized bathing robes?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:7.8: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:7.9: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:8.1: ‘If a nun is getting a bathing robe made, it should be made the right size. This is the right size: 1 meter long and 50 centimeters wide. If it exceeds that, it is to be cut down, and she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:9.2: wearing it as a sarong, she bathes.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:10.2: making it herself or getting someone else to make it, it should be made the right size.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:11.2: This is the right size: 1 meter long and 50 centimeters wide.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:11.5: If she makes one or gets one made that exceeds that, then the effort constitutes wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:11.6: When she obtains it, it is to be cut down, and she is then to confess an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:12.1: If she finishes what she began herself, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:12.2: If she gets others to finish what she began herself, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:12.3: If she finishes herself what was begun by others, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:12.4: If she gets others to finish what was begun by others, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:13.1: If she makes one or gets one made for the benefit of someone else, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:13.2: If she obtains one that was made by someone else and then uses it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:14.2: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:15.1: The second training rule is finished.
